name: A Dev's Tale
description:
~"Created for the jam "Sviluppare Giochi"~

Play the part of a neophyte developer and a bit sadistic. Have fun with him developing his dream video game and discover how all this can be something dangerous.

Controls:

  • Q-W to see around    ---     Esc to leave the workstation
  • A-D to move
  • Click to interact
